content:
Craft an item of type: cookie
inventory=[{"type": "prismarine_stairs", "quantity": 47, "index": 12}, {"type": "quartz_stairs", "quantity": 56, "index": 14}, {"type": "enderman_spawn_egg", "quantity": 42, "index": 20}, {"type": "cocoa_beans", "quantity": 1, "index": 21}, {"type": "hay_block", "quantity": 1, "index": 30}, {"type": "polished_blackstone", "quantity": 10, "index": 33}, {"type": "red_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 36}, {"type": "firework_star", "quantity": 9, "index": 39}, {"type": "book", "quantity": 7, "index": 44}, {"type": "iron_sword", "quantity": 1, "index": 45}]

thought: To craft cookies, I first need to craft wheat. Wheat can be crafted by placing a hay block on the crafting table. The hay block is located at slot 30, and so I will move it to slot 1 of the crafting table.
Ok
act: move from slot 30 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: cookie
inventory=[{"type": "wheat", "quantity": 9, "index": 0}, {"type": "hay_block", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "prismarine_stairs", "quantity": 47, "index": 12}, {"type": "quartz_stairs", "quantity": 56, "index": 14}, {"type": "enderman_spawn_egg", "quantity": 42, "index": 20}, {"type": "cocoa_beans", "quantity": 1, "index": 21}, {"type": "polished_blackstone", "quantity": 10, "index": 33}, {"type": "red_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 36}, {"type": "firework_star", "quantity": 9, "index": 39}, {"type": "book", "quantity": 7, "index": 44}, {"type": "iron_sword", "quantity": 1, "index": 45}]
thought: I have now crafted the wheat, and so I must move it from the crafting table to an empty slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 9

Craft an item of type: cookie
inventory=[{"type": "wheat", "quantity": 9, "index": 11}, {"type": "prismarine_stairs", "quantity": 47, "index": 12}, {"type": "quartz_stairs", "quantity": 56, "index": 14}, {"type": "enderman_spawn_egg", "quantity": 42, "index": 20}, {"type": "cocoa_beans", "quantity": 1, "index": 21}, {"type": "polished_blackstone", "quantity": 10, "index": 33}, {"type": "red_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 36}, {"type": "firework_star", "quantity": 9, "index": 39}, {"type": "book", "quantity": 7, "index": 44}, {"type": "iron_sword", "quantity": 1, "index": 45}]
thought: To craft a cookie, I need to place wheat, cocoa beans, and wheat in a row. I have the cocoa beans at slot 21, so I will start by moving one wheat into slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: cookie
inventory=[{"type": "wheat", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "wheat", "quantity": 8, "index": 11}, {"type": "prismarine_stairs", "quantity": 47, "index": 12}, {"type": "quartz_stairs", "quantity": 56, "index": 14}, {"type": "enderman_spawn_egg", "quantity": 42, "index": 20}, {"type": "cocoa_beans", "quantity": 1, "index": 21}, {"type": "polished_blackstone", "quantity": 10, "index": 33}, {"type": "red_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 36}, {"type": "firework_star", "quantity": 9, "index": 39}, {"type": "book", "quantity": 7, "index": 44}, {"type": "iron_sword", "quantity": 1, "index": 45}]
thought: Now I need to move the cocoa beans into slot 2, which is directly to the right of slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 21 to slot 2 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: cookie
inventory=[{"type": "wheat", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "cocoa_beans", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "wheat", "quantity": 8, "index": 11}, {"type": "prismarine_stairs", "quantity": 47, "index": 12}, {"type": "quartz_stairs", "quantity": 56, "index": 14}, {"type": "enderman_spawn_egg", "quantity": 42, "index": 20}, {"type": "polished_blackstone", "quantity": 10, "index": 33}, {"type": "red_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 36}, {"type": "firework_star", "quantity": 9, "index": 39}, {"type": "book", "quantity": 7, "index": 44}, {"type": "iron_sword", "quantity": 1, "index": 45}]
thought: Finally, I need to move another wheat into slot 3, which is directly to the right of slot 2. This will complete the recipe for a cookie.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 3 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: cookie
inventory=[{"type": "cookie", "quantity": 8, "index": 0}, {"type": "wheat", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "cocoa_beans", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "wheat", "quantity": 1, "index": 3}, {"type": "wheat", "quantity": 7, "index": 11}, {"type": "prismarine_stairs", "quantity": 47, "index": 12}, {"type": "quartz_stairs", "quantity": 56, "index": 14}, {"type": "enderman_spawn_egg", "quantity": 42, "index": 20}, {"type": "polished_blackstone", "quantity": 10, "index": 33}, {"type": "red_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 36}, {"type": "firework_star", "quantity": 9, "index": 39}, {"type": "book", "quantity": 7, "index": 44}, {"type": "iron_sword", "quantity": 1, "index": 45}]
thought: The cookies have been crafted and are now in the craft slot (0). I will move them to a free inventory slot (eg., 13).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 13 with quantity 8
